text: Lapin Kulta is Finnish, Hartwalls brand of beer. Traditionally it's been made in Tornio but 2010 production moved to Lahti. ==Products== * Lapin Kulta I * Lapin Kulta III * Lapin Kulta IVA (5,2 %) * Lapin Kulta Long Neck * Lapin Kulta Tuisku == Other websites == * Lapin Kulta Category:Finnish beers Category:Lahti
title: Lapin Kulta
